value.name: Zoé's León Larregui on What's Kept the Mexican Rock Band 'United' for 25 Years: 'We're Family'
value.description: "We found ourselves writing songs on our own and realizing that the sounds of them were very similar," Larregui tells PEOPLE from Spain, referring to his bandmates Sergio Acosta, Jesús Baez, Ángel Mosqueda and Rodrigo Guardiola. "It went farther than the ...
